'''Bamboo Segment'''  is obtained by cutting down Qingce Bamboo. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==How to Obtain==
Qingce Bamboo is found in [[Bishui Plain]] south of [[Qingce Village]] and in [[Yujing Terrace]].

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=176 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

==Trivia==
* Qingce Bamboo Trees symbolize "a pure, righteous, all-enduring gentleman" due to the tree's appearance.<ref>Tutorial: [[Tutorial/Collecting Wood|Collecting Wood]]</ref>
* Certain types of bamboo trees live up to 100 years.<ref>{{Ref/Furnishing|Qingce Skysail Bamboo}}</ref>
* Bamboo Trees are shown in the Vision Hunt Decree scene in [https://youtu.be/ST5v7-C3iDk Kaedehara Kazuha's Character Teaser], but bamboo segments cannot be found in Inazuma at all.
